column1: After entering Beleriand at [[Morgoth]]'s bidding, Ulfang and his sons joined the service of [[Caranthir]].<ref>{{S
column2: 18}}</ref> Their purpose was to eventually betray the Elves, which they did in the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad]]. They turned against their allies, attacking them in the rear. Ulfast was slain by the sons of [[Bór]], who had stayed loyal to the sons of [[Fëanor]].<ref>{{S
